record.title: ADJOURNMENT UNTIL 9:30 A.M. TOMORROW
record.narrative:
ADJOURNMENT UNTIL 9:30 A.M. TOMORROW -- (Senate - May 21, 2008)

[Page: S4707]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate stand adjourned under the previous order.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 9:29 p.m., adjourned until Thursday, May 22, 2008, at 9:30 a.m.
